sentence: Here's our Burgess Everett with why: Liz Cheney is aware, and finds it "concerning" that the Wyoming GOP chief aiding her party's bid to unseat her is an alleged member of the far-right Oath Keepers.
title: Joe Biden said he wants to break up his stalled $1.7T social spending bill into legislative "chunks." That likely means one smaller bill.
